titles.title: Social Security Benefit Payments Choice Act of 2018
To amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit individuals to select a monthly benefit payment date.
Social Security Benefit Payments Choice Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

bill.summary:
Social Security Benefit Payments Choice Act of 2018
This bill allows a recipient of monthly Old Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance benefits, unless the recipient is concurrently entitled to Supplemental Security Income benefits, to choose the day of the month upon which to receive such benefits.
